original_text: The bar that would go across the centre of the boards would reach from one end of the tabernacle to the other end.
korean_text: 그 중간 띠를 만들되 널판 중간 이 끝에서 저 끝에 미치게 하였으며

sentences.original_text: The bar would go across the centre of the boards
sentences.korean_translation: 그 막대는 판자들의 중앙을 가로질러 갈 것입니다

sentences.original_text: would reach from one end of the tabernacle
